sentences.en: As soon as the police disappear the violence will take up from where it left off.
sentences.cn: 警察一走，暴力事件就会死灰复燃。

sentences.en: At this point the path seemed to disappear altogether (= disappear completely ) .
sentences.cn: 小路到这里好像完全消失了。

sentences.en: By means of a clever trick, he made it ( seem to ) disappear.
sentences.cn: 他用了个巧妙的手法, 把它变没了.

sentences.en: Cross - border trade and service barriers began to gradually disappear.
sentences.cn: 贸易与服务 跨 国界流动的障碍逐渐消除.

sentences.en: In France the money tends to disappear into the sock; here it goes into circulation.
sentences.cn: 在法国金钱往往被藏到钱柜里, 在这里却是进入流通.

sentences.en: Jobs have continue continued to disappear those, though at slower rates.
sentences.cn: 失业还在继续, 尽管比例较低.

sentences.en: Price control would gradually disappear in favor of a free market.
sentences.cn: 价格控制逐渐被自由市场所代替.

sentences.en: Red squirrels disappear inside the trees.
sentences.cn: 红松鼠藏到树里面去了.

sentences.en: The courier will give him a million from the boss to disappear.
sentences.cn: 快递会给他一百万从老板到失踪.

sentences.en: The look will leave your eyes. Your mouth will change. Your power to act will disappear.
sentences.cn: 你的眼睛会失色, 你的嘴巴会变样, 你的表演能力会化为乌有.

sentences.en: The prisoners disappear in single file into the gray flat - roofed building.
sentences.cn: 这些俘虏排成单行走进灰色的平顶房子就不见了.

sentences.en: The rumour had to disappear before facts.
sentences.cn: 在真相面前谣言不得不消声匿迹.

sentences.en: The snow will soon disappear when the warm weather comes.
sentences.cn: 天气变暖时,雪很快就会融化.

sentences.en: The stain on the face after laser takes mole can disappear?
sentences.cn: 激光取痣后脸上的污点能消 吗 ?

sentences.en: The two girls disappeared while walking home from school..
sentences.cn: 这两名女孩在放学回家的路上失踪了。

sentences.en: This soap works like magic — the stains just disappear.
sentences.cn: 这种肥皂真神奇,污垢一下子就没了.

sentences.en: When you think of a friend the miles between you disappear.

trans.tran_en: to become impossible to see any longer

trans.tran_cn: 消失， 不见； 消亡， 失踪
trans.tran_en: to become impossible to see any longer
